title: Workplace NIGHTMARES - The "BIG 4" are TOXIC

Join me as I dive into the eye-opening and somewhat baffling world of Big 4 work culture, specifically taking a closer look at PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC). After stumbling upon the PWC subreddit, I was both amused and horrified by what I found. From the competition of working insane overtime without extra pay to the high school drama of office politics, it's a wild ride. In this video, I share my thoughts on why the allure of
